segments.text: I observe the woman drying dishes by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her apron, totally engrossed in the task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours down the front, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in it, unaware of the slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the way, and it's so peaceful out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the boy's on the tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the cookie jar with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists, hand outstretched for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief could end in tears if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are open, framing their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby add to the domestic feel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light highlights the contrast of calm outside and chaos in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone intervenes before an accident occurs.
segments.speaker: PAR
